name: Hunting Season
description:
Every year, hunting enthusiastis from all around the world get together on a grand hunt for game. It's the »hunting season« and he who collects the most tropies will earn great respect and admiration by his hunter peers.

In this game, you play a deer ;)

# NOTE:

This game abandoned and quite unfinished.
Still I believe what's there is worth playing so go ahead!

You can listen to the soundtrack HERE.
